header_3_text_color=”#0075c9″ text_orientation=”center”]

Listing Marketing Automation

 

Your personal marketing assistant without the paycheck!
For each new listing, automatically receive a customizable property marketing package to promote it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

For each new listing, you’ll receive:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Automation-02-1.png” alt=”Single property websites, one click social media posts, listing emails, and ready to print postcards” title_text=”Single property websites, one click social media posts, listing emails, and ready to print postcards” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ max_width=”84%” module_alignment=”center” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”1px” admin_label=”What-You’ll-Get Bulleted List” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_line_height=”1.3em” ul_font=”Roboto||||||||” ul_line_height=”2em” ol_font=”Roboto||||||||” ol_text_align=”left” ol_text_color=”#686868″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin_tablet=”|||100px” custom_margin_phone=”|||30px” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

  • A beautiful single property website (Pro and Business Suite)
  • A polished listing email with a simple tool to target the right contacts
  • One-click social media posts for Facebook and LinkedIn
  • Ready-to-print flyers and postcards

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”2px|0px|27px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”%22Wow sellers with a listing marketing activity report!%22″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_2_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”30px”]

Wow sellers with a listing marketing activity report!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider color=”#d6d6d6″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|27px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”50px|0px|27px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”%22Automate Your Marketing%22 Section” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_font=”Roboto|100|||||||” header_font_size=”36px” header_3_font=”Roboto||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#0075c9″ text_orientation=”center”]

Automate Your Marketing

While you’re out selling homes, your system helps you stay engaged with your sphere.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Automated Marketing Features Bulleted List” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.4em” custom_margin_tablet=”|||50px” custom_margin_phone=”|||30px” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”|50px||80px” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|0px||0px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

  • Professionally crafted monthly newsletter
  • Automated, multi-channel (print, email, and phone) campaigns
  • Automatically assign new leads to a campaign and connect one campaign to the next
  • Auto-insert contacts from over 25 sources including Google, Zillow, and Realtor.com
  • Schedule birthday and anniversary cards for past clients in advance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Video” _builder_version=”3.27.4″]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider color=”#d6d6d6″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|15px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|150px||150px” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px” custom_padding_phone=”|||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”%22Content Library%22 Section Header” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_font=”Roboto|100|||||||” header_font_size=”36px” header_line_height=”2.2em” header_3_font=”Roboto||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#0075c9″]

Content Library

A Complete Marketing Suite

Pre-loaded with your company logo and branding, leverage a complete library of beautifully designed postcards, flyers, greeting cards, business cards, guides, and video-enabled, mobile-responsive emails.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Automation-04.png” alt=”Marketing design center with email and print templates” title_text=”Marketing design center with email and print templates” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Image for Market Suite Content Library Section” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider color=”#d6d6d6″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|33px|0px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”47px|0px|66px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|150px||150px” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px” custom_padding_phone=”|||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”%22Print%22 Section” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”Roboto||||||||” header_font=”Roboto|100|||||||” header_font_size=”36px” header_line_height=”2em” header_3_font=”Roboto||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#0075c9″]

Print

Print and Direct Mail Marketing for Real Estate
With so many agents turning to digital marketing, print marketing is a great way to set yourself apart. Market Leader print options make printing easy and effective.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”-50px|||” custom_margin_phone=”|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”|40px||40px” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|30px||30px” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Automation-08.png” alt=”Thumbs up icon, print fulfillment from Xpressdocs” image_max_width=”60%” admin_label=”%22Enjoy discounted Shutterly pricing%22 Blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_text_align=”center” body_line_height=”2em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ header_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Enjoy discounted and very competitive pricing through Shutterfly®

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”|||” custom_padding_phone=”30px|30px||30px” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Automation-07.png” alt=”Upload a mailing list icon” image_max_width=”60%” admin_label=”%22Mail bulk orders%22 Blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ animation=”off”]

Mail bulk orders to yourself or upload a list and we’ll do the rest!

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px|||” custom_padding_phone=”30px|30px||30px” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Automation-05.png” alt=”Market design center icon” image_max_width=”60%” admin_label=”%22Integrated with your MLS%22 Blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Integrated with your MLS, create property marketing in a snap

Elevate Your Marketing

The complete Marketing Center, including marketing automation, is fully integrated with the Market Leader CRM. This makes it easier than ever to track which contacts are engaging with your campaigns.

Available in Market Leader Pro, Business Suite, and Pro for Teams.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Footer Section Button” _builder_version=”4.9.7″]
